class.name: Occluder3D
class.brief_description: Occluder shape resource for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D].
class.description: [Occluder3D] stores an occluder shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system. See [OccluderInstance3D]'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.

method.name: get_indices
method.description: Returns the occluder shape's vertex indices.

method.name: get_vertices
method.description: Returns the occluder shape's vertex positions.
